description.ro: Furia este o emotie puternica de mobilizare care apare cand percepi nedreptate, incalcarea granitelor sau frustrarea nevoilor tale fundamentale. Este energia care te impinge sa schimbi ceea ce este gresit. Furia nu este distructiva in sine — modul in care o exprimi face diferenta. Furia ascultata si canalizata devine o forta de transformare.
description.en: Anger is a powerful mobilizing emotion that arises when you perceive injustice, boundary violation, or the frustration of your fundamental needs. It is the energy that pushes you to change what is wrong. Anger is not destructive in itself — how you express it makes the difference. Anger listened to and channeled becomes a force for transformation.

description.ro: Dezamagirea este durerea asteptarilor neimplinite — ai crezut in cineva sau in ceva si realitatea nu a corespuns. Combina tristetea pierderii cu furia ca promisiunea nu a fost respectata. Dezamagirea repetata erodeaza increderea si poate duce la cinism defensiv. Vindecarea include ajustarea asteptarilor si comunicarea deschisa a nevoilor.
description.en: Being let down is the pain of unfulfilled expectations — you believed in someone or something and reality didn't correspond. It combines the sadness of loss with the anger that the promise wasn't kept. Repeated disappointment erodes trust and can lead to defensive cynicism. Healing includes adjusting expectations and openly communicating needs.

description.ro: Tradarea este ruptura devastatoare a increderii de catre cineva in care aveai incredere profunda. Combina socul descoperirii cu furia si durerea pierderii relatiei asa cum o cunosteai. Tradarea poate modifica fundamental modul in care te raportezi la incredere in viitor. Vindecarea este posibila dar lenta si necesita doliu, restabilirea granitelor si, uneori, iertare.
description.en: Betrayal is the devastating rupture of trust by someone in whom you had deep trust. It combines the shock of discovery with anger and the pain of losing the relationship as you knew it. Betrayal can fundamentally change how you relate to trust in the future. Healing is possible but slow and requires grieving, reestablishing boundaries, and sometimes forgiveness.

description.ro: Resentimentul este furia care a fost inghitita dar nu digerata — o ranchiuna tacuta care se acumuleaza cu fiecare noua nedreptate perceputa. Te simti victimizat dar nu exprimi. Resentimentul este toxic pentru ca te tine legat de trecut si de persoana care te-a ranit. Eliberarea vine prin exprimarea directa a nevoilor si prin procesarea furiei.
description.en: Resentment is anger that was swallowed but not digested — a silent grudge that accumulates with each new perceived injustice. You feel victimized but don't express it. Resentment is toxic because it keeps you tied to the past and to the person who hurt you. Release comes through direct expression of needs and processing anger.

description.ro: Sentimentul de a fi inselat este furia specifica care apare cand descoperi ca cineva ti-a prezentat deliberat o realitate falsa — te-a mintit, te-a manipulat sau ti-a ascuns adevarul. Este diferit de tradare, care implica ruperea loialitatii; insalarea este despre realitatea care se dovedeste a fi fost construita. Furia inselaciunii vine din pierderea increderii in propria perceptie — nu doar ca celalalt a gresit, ci ca tu ai fost facut sa crezi ceva fals.
description.en: The feeling of being deceived is the specific anger that arises when you discover someone deliberately presented you with a false reality — they lied to you, manipulated you, or hid the truth from you. It is different from betrayal, which implies broken loyalty; deception is about reality that turns out to have been constructed. The anger of deception comes from losing trust in your own perception — not just that the other person was wrong, but that you were made to believe something false.

description.ro: Umilirea este experienta de a fi facut sa te simti mic, ndemn si lipsit de valoare in fata celorlalti. Ataca nucleul identitatii tale sociale. Umilirea provoaca o furie intensa amestecata cu rusine — vrei simultan sa dispari si sa te razbuni. Este una dintre cele mai dificile rani emotionale de vindecat si poate genera resentimente de lunga durata.
description.en: Humiliation is the experience of being made to feel small, unworthy, and valueless in front of others. It attacks the core of your social identity. Humiliation provokes intense anger mixed with shame — you simultaneously want to disappear and to retaliate. It is one of the most difficult emotional wounds to heal and can generate long-lasting resentments.

description.ro: A fi tratat cu lipsa de respect inseamna ca demnitatea ta a fost ignorata sau incalcata. Cineva ti-a comunicat, explicit sau implicit, ca nu contezi suficient. Lipsa de respect activeaza o furie legitima de protectie a sinelui. Raspunsul sanatos este asertivitatea calma — a numi ce s-a intamplat si a cere schimbarea comportamentului.
description.en: Being disrespected means your dignity was ignored or violated. Someone communicated, explicitly or implicitly, that you don't matter enough. Disrespect activates legitimate anger in protection of the self. The healthy response is calm assertiveness — naming what happened and requesting a change in behavior.

description.ro: Ridiculizarea este o forma de agresiune sociala in care esti transformat in obiect de ras. Combina umilirea cu izolarea — esti scos din grup prin deriziune. Ridiculizarea lasa rani adanci in stima de sine si poate genera fie retragere sociala, fie furie intensa. Vindecarea include validarea durerii si reconstruirea sentimentului de valoare.
description.en: Ridicule is a form of social aggression where you are turned into an object of laughter. It combines humiliation with isolation — you are expelled from the group through mockery. Ridicule leaves deep wounds in self-esteem and can generate either social withdrawal or intense anger. Healing includes validating the pain and rebuilding the sense of worth.

description.ro: Degradarea este forma cea mai profunda a umilirii — experienta de a fi tratat ca fiind sub nivelul uman, de a ti se nega demnitatea fundamentala. Nu este doar lipsa de respect sau batjocura, ci o negare sistematica a valorii tale ca fiinta umana. Aceasta experienta provoaca o furie intensa amestecata cu socul de a fi dezumanizat. Degradarea lasa rani adanci care necesita reparare constienta a stimei de sine si recunoastere externa a demnitatii tale.
description.en: Degradation is the deepest form of humiliation — the experience of being treated as beneath human level, of having your fundamental dignity denied. It is not just disrespect or mockery, but a systematic denial of your worth as a human being. This experience provokes intense anger mixed with the shock of being dehumanized. Degradation leaves deep wounds that require conscious repair of self-esteem and external recognition of your dignity.

description.ro: Amaraciunea este furia care s-a sedimentat in timp — un resentiment cronic cauzat de nedreptati repetate sau nerezolvate. Este ca o otrava lenta care iti coloreaza perceptia lumii in tonuri intunecate. Amaraciunea te protejeaza de noi dezamagiri, dar te si izoleaza de bucurie si conexiune. Eliberarea vine prin doliu si prin alegerea constienta de a nu mai purta povara.
description.en: Bitterness is anger that has settled over time — a chronic resentment caused by repeated or unresolved injustices. It is like a slow poison that colors your perception of the world in dark tones. Bitterness protects you from new disappointments, but also isolates you from joy and connection. Release comes through grieving and the conscious choice to no longer carry the burden.

description.ro: Indignarea este furia morala — reactia la ceva profund nedrept sau incorect. Este emotia care spune 'nu ar trebui sa fie asa' cu o convingere puternica. Indignarea sanatoasa te motiveaza sa actionezi pentru dreptate. Devine problematica cand se transforma in superioritate morala sau in furie cronica.
description.en: Indignation is moral anger — the reaction to something profoundly unfair or incorrect. It is the emotion that says 'it shouldn't be this way' with strong conviction. Healthy indignation motivates you to act for justice. It becomes problematic when it transforms into moral superiority or chronic rage.

description.ro: A te simti violat inseamna ca o limita fundamentala a fost transgresta fara consimtamantul tau — fizic, emotional sau moral. Este una dintre cele mai devastatoare experiente, care ataca sentimentul de siguranta si de control asupra propriei persoane. Vindecarea este un proces lung care necesita sprijin profesional, validare si restabilirea treptata a sentimentului de agentivitate.
description.en: Feeling violated means a fundamental boundary was transgressed without your consent — physically, emotionally, or morally. It is one of the most devastating experiences, attacking the sense of safety and control over your own person. Healing is a long process requiring professional support, validation, and gradual restoration of the sense of agency.

description.ro: A fi nebun de furie este o stare de intensitate emotionala extrema in care rationalitatii i se ia locul de impulsivitate. Gandirea devine alb-negru, empatia dispare si tot ce simti este nevoia de a actiona. Este furia care a depasit capacitatea de autoreglare. Aceasta stare necesita o pauza imediata inainte de orice actiune pentru a preveni daune ireversibile.
description.en: Being mad is a state of extreme emotional intensity where rationality is replaced by impulsivity. Thinking becomes black-and-white, empathy disappears, and all you feel is the need to act. It is anger that has exceeded the capacity for self-regulation. This state requires an immediate pause before any action to prevent irreversible damage.

description.ro: A fi furibund este intensitatea maxima a furiei — o stare in care energia agresiva iti copleseste toate celelalte procese. Corpul tremura, fata se incinge si simti nevoia imperioasa de distrugere. In aceasta stare, capacitatea de gandire rationala este sever diminuata. Este esential sa recunosti aceasta stare si sa te retragi inainte de a actiona.
description.en: Being furious is the maximum intensity of anger — a state where aggressive energy overwhelms all other processes. The body trembles, the face burns, and you feel an imperious need for destruction. In this state, rational thinking capacity is severely diminished. It is essential to recognize this state and withdraw before acting.

description.ro: Gelozia este frica de a pierde ceva pretios — de obicei o relatie — in favoarea unui rival. Combina iubirea, frica si furia intr-un amestec volatil. Gelozia moderata poate semnala investitie emotionala autentica. Gelozia excesiva reflecta insecuritate profunda si nevoia de control. Lucrul cu gelozia incepe cu examinarea fricilor subiacente.
description.en: Jealousy is the fear of losing something precious — usually a relationship — to a rival. It combines love, fear, and anger in a volatile mix. Moderate jealousy can signal authentic emotional investment. Excessive jealousy reflects deep insecurity and the need for control. Working with jealousy begins with examining the underlying fears.

description.ro: Furia extrema este starea in care minia a depasit orice capacitate de control — simti ca esti consumat complet de o energie distructiva care cere eliberare imediata. Corpul tremura, vederea se ingusteaza si gandirea rationala dispare aproape complet. Este o stare periculoasa nu pentru ca emotia in sine ar fi gresita, ci pentru ca actiunile luate in aceasta stare sunt aproape intotdeauna disproportionate. Prioritatea absoluta este pauza — orice actiune poate astepta pana cand corpul se calmeaza.
description.en: Rage is the state where anger has exceeded all capacity for control — you feel completely consumed by a destructive energy that demands immediate release. The body trembles, vision narrows, and rational thinking nearly disappears. It is a dangerous state not because the emotion itself is wrong, but because actions taken in this state are almost always disproportionate. The absolute priority is pause — any action can wait until the body calms down.

needs.ro: pauza imediata si descarcare fizica sigura
needs.en: immediate pause and safe physical discharge
